Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher

Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Completely satisfied with the machine, does the job very well.We should have reasonable expectations what the machine can do; tough dry stains from tea, milk can be cleaned but you need to select the right program and the vessels have to be placed appropriately - you can figure this out by seeing the water sprinkling ports on the rotating blades.Saves water; detergent/ salt/ rise aid consumption is low.Bosch is good.100% recommended!

Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: it's a decent product . you have to keep the utensils in a particular fashion to get best results . even though Bosch says " no prerinse required and just have to scrape the food materials " . this is not fully true . if the plate is dry , then there can be some residue still remaining after cleaning . this is seen even with the intensive kadai option . However for lazy People like me and my wife , it's a good buy . Recommend to soak the dishes in water immediately after your meal which make ...

Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher

Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: I'm writing this review after 7 months of usage. the dishwasher looks pretty cool and also does the job it's meant to.. dishes come out really well. there are 5 menus to wash which you can juggle between depending on the dish load. one gripe is it doesn't clean any dirt that's stuck well - like the tea vessel or idly plates. apart from that it's a very good appliance to have. no problems so far.

Product: BOSCH SMS66GW01I Free Standing 13 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher

Lime deposits on dishes that have been in contact with water for a long time also remain on the dishes. Also Does not wash well the undersides of pans and pans.
